name: Chemixer at War
description:
This is the game Chemixer at War (chemixer is a play on Chemicals and Mixer!)

NOTE: You can play this game in browser, but it is recommended that you play it by downloading the game executable.

You play as a scientist who has been recruited for your country during a war, and you must mix chemicals in order to invent useful tools for your country and your soldiers!

This game was made for Xanderjam #4 - Summer Jam in 5 days by 1 developer, though a couple of assets were used from the web (credits below).

Controls:

Mouse = Select

Keyboard = Typing

Credits:

This game was developed by: thisGameDev
